Room.Name: Evenborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Evenborough Way, west of Evenborough Park.
Room.LongDescription: The large Evenborough Park rests on the eastern side of the road. The park lies just to the west of the Lyanden Castle, and is often used as a public auditorium so that the King may make any announcements to the general public. On the west side of the road is a small armory for Knights of the Castle.
